premiumOak.title: Natural Oak Parquet
premiumOak.text: Dutch high-quality solid oak parquet, as well as 2- and 3-layer systems designed to resist deformation caused by heat and humidity. Finished with Dutch oils for hardness, durability, UV protection, and decades of beauty.

premiumOakCustom.title: Premium Oak Floors
premiumOakCustom.text: 100% Dutch quality. Multi-layer oak parquet with customizable colors, textures, dimensions, and installation systems. WINTERSTEIGER and TRC technology ensure minimal movement. Finished with top-class UV oil coatings.

hybridWood.title: Hybrid Wood Floors
hybridWood.text: Hybrid wood floors combine oak aesthetics with practicality. Natural wood, free of chemicals, compressed for exceptional hardness and 24-hour water resistance. Certified by REACH, FloorScore, and GreenGuard Gold.

vinyl.title: Premium Vinyl Floors
vinyl.text: Premium vinyl for homes and offices. Dryback system for commercial spaces. Anti-Glare technology. Rigid Click with i4F system and mineral particles for stability. Easy installation. REACH certified. Phthalate-free!

naturalOak.title: Natural Oak Floors
naturalOak.description: Authentic solid oak flooring with natural beauty and durability

hybridWood.title: Hybrid Wood Floors

hero.title: Hybrid Wood Collection
hero.subtitle: The perfect blend of natural beauty and modern innovations

overview.title: Revolutionary Flooring Technology
overview.subtitle: Experience the future of flooring with hybrid wood - where authentic oak meets advanced engineering
overview.description: Hybrid Wood flooring represents a breakthrough in flooring technology, combining the natural beauty of real oak with innovative engineering. Using 90% less oak than traditional parquet while maintaining authentic wood appearance and superior performance characteristics.

waterResistance.title: Water Resistant
waterResistance.description: 24-hour water resistance protects against spills and moisture

scratchResistance.title: Scratch Resistant
scratchResistance.description: Extremely durable,  AC5 rating, surface perfect for high-traffic areas.

warranty.title: Long Warranty
warranty.description: Up to 25-year warranty for long-term peace of mind

revolutionaryTech.title: Revolutionary Tech
revolutionaryTech.description: Chemical-free Wood Powder technology combining real oak with advanced engineering

underfloorHeating.title: Floor Heating Compatible
underfloorHeating.description: Low thermal resistance (0.07 m²K/W) perfect for underfloor heating systems

ecoFriendly.title: Eco-Friendly
ecoFriendly.description: Uses 90% less oak with HDF core from sustainable wood chips

sustainability.title: Eco-Friendly Innovation
sustainability.description: Hybrid Wood flooring leads the way in sustainable flooring solutions, dramatically reducing environmental impact while delivering premium quality and performance.
sustainability.benefit1: Uses 90% less oak wood compared to traditional parquet
sustainability.benefit2: Made with recycled HDF core from sustainable wood chips
sustainability.benefit3: Chemical-free production process protects indoor air quality
sustainability.imageCaption: [Image: Sustainability certifications and eco-friendly production process]

xlPlanks.imageCaption: [Image: Room showcasing XL plank hybrid wood flooring]

hero.title: Premium Vinyl Collection
hero.subtitle: Discover оур exceptional vinyl collections combining Dutch quality with 100% waterproof performance

overview.title: Premium Dutch Vinyl Flooring
overview.subtitle: Floer's comprehensive vinyl collection offers unmatched quality and variety
overview.description: From the renowned Dutch flooring manufacturer Floer, these 5 distinct vinyl collections deliver exceptional performance, stunning aesthetics, and innovative features. Each collection is 100% waterproof, phthalate-free, and backed by a 20-year warranty, making them perfect for modern homes and commercial spaces.

collections.title: Five Exceptional Collections
collections.subtitle: Each collection designed for specific needs and aesthetic preferences

tileVinyl.name: Tile Vinyl
tileVinyl.description: Large format stone and concrete looks, specifically designed for damp areas with excellent underfloor heating compatibility.

herringboneVinyl.name: Herringbone Vinyl
herringboneVinyl.description: Elegant herringbone patterns in standard and XL sizes, featuring ceramic bead technology for enhanced durability.

natureRigid.name: Nature Rigid Click
natureRigid.description: Commercial-grade vinyl with rigid mineral core providing superior stability and scratch resistance.

villageVinyl.name: Village Vinyl
villageVinyl.description: Realistic oak aesthetics with strong wearing surface, perfect for various interior design preferences.

forestVinyl.name: Forest Vinyl
forestVinyl.description: Extra-wide planks creating unique spatial effects with realistic oak structures and luxurious microbevel.

features.title: Shared Premium Benefits
features.subtitle: Every Floer vinyl collection delivers exceptional quality and performance

waterproof.title: 100% Waterproof
waterproof.description: Complete moisture protection for kitchens, bathrooms, and commercial spaces with confidence.

warranty.title: 20-Year Warranty
warranty.description: Comprehensive coverage for residential, commercial, and industrial applications.

ecoFriendly.title: Eco-Friendly
ecoFriendly.description: Phthalate-free production with bio-organic plasticizers and top environmental certifications.

durability.title: Superior Durability
durability.description: Usage classes from 23/33 to 42, suitable for intensive residential and commercial use.

installation.title: Flexible Installation
installation.description: Multiple installation methods including DIY-friendly click systems and professional glue-down options.

soundInsulation.title: Sound Insulation
soundInsulation.description: 10dB certified underlayment options available for enhanced acoustic performance.

comparison.title: Collection Comparison
comparison.subtitle: Compare specifications across all five Floer vinyl collections
comparison.note: All collections include FloorScore, GreenGuard, and REACH certifications

installation.title: Installation Methods
installation.subtitle: Professional and DIY-friendly options to suit every project and skill level

clickSystem.title: Click System (Floating)
clickSystem.description: Easy DIY installation with interlocking planks that float over the subfloor. No adhesive required, perfect for beginners.

glueDown.title: Glue-Down (Dryback)
glueDown.description: Permanent installation using specialized vinyl adhesive. Provides maximum stability and is ideal for commercial applications.

preparation.title: Subfloor Preparation
preparation.description: Ensure clean, level, and dry subfloor meeting manufacturer specifications

measurement.title: Accurate Measurement
measurement.description: Plan layout and calculate materials needed with 5-10% extra for cuts

installation.title: Install Flooring
installation.description: Follow chosen method with proper tools and techniques for best results

finishing.title: Finishing Touches
finishing.description: Install transitions, baseboards, and final cleanup for professional appearance

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Space?
cta.description: Discover the perfect Floer vinyl collection for your project. Our experts are ready to help you choose the ideal flooring solution.
cta.contact: Contact us today for personalized consultation and quotes

hero.title: What is Hybrid Wood Flooring?
hero.subtitle: Discover the revolutionary flooring technology that combines natural oak beauty with advanced engineering for superior durability and sustainability.

introduction.title: A Revolutionary Flooring Solution
introduction.content: Hybrid Wood floors represent the next evolution in flooring technology, combining the authentic beauty of real wood with advanced engineering to create an extremely durable and functional flooring solution. This innovative approach uses 10 times less oak wood than traditional parquet while maintaining the genuine wood appearance and feel that homeowners love.
introduction.imageCaption: [Image: Close-up view of hybrid wood floor planks showing natural oak texture and grain]

innovation.title: The Science Behind Hybrid Wood
innovation.content: At the heart of hybrid wood technology lies an ultra-thin layer of lacquered oak wood combined with a high-density HDF (High Density Fiberboard) core made from recycled wood chips. This unique construction method uses chemical-free Wood Powder technology to create a flooring product that outperforms traditional materials.

benefits.title: Key Innovations:
benefits.woodPowder: Chemical-free Wood Powder technology for sustainable production
benefits.ultraThin: Ultra-thin oak layer provides authentic wood appearance with minimal resource use
benefits.hdfCore: High-density core made from recycled wood chips for enhanced stability
benefits.engineering: Advanced engineering combines traditional craftsmanship with modern technology

waterResistant.title: 24-Hour Water Resistance
waterResistant.description: Superior moisture protection that withstands spills and humidity

scratchResistant.title: Extremely Scratch Resistant
scratchResistant.description: Perfect for high-traffic areas and homes with pets and children

warranty.title: 15-35 Year Warranty
warranty.description: Long-term reliability guarantee for peace of mind

underfloorHeating.title: Underfloor Heating Compatible
underfloorHeating.description: Low thermal resistance (0.07 m2K/W) ensures efficient heat transfer

subfloors.title: Multiple Subfloor Options
subfloors.description: Flexible installation on various subfloor types

sustainability.title: Environmental Responsibility
sustainability.intro: Hybrid Wood flooring represents a significant step forward in sustainable flooring solutions, dramatically reducing environmental impact while maintaining premium quality and appearance.
sustainability.lessWood: Uses 90% less oak wood compared to traditional parquet flooring
sustainability.recycled: HDF core constructed from recycled wood chips and sustainable materials
sustainability.chemicalFree: Chemical-free production process protects both environment and indoor air quality
sustainability.responsibleSourcing: Sustainably sourced oak from responsibly managed forests
sustainability.imageCaption: [Image: Infographic showing environmental benefits and sustainability certifications]

installation.title: Easy Installation Options
installation.intro: Hybrid Wood flooring is designed for both professional installation and DIY enthusiasts, offering multiple installation methods to suit different needs and skill levels.

floating.title: Floating Installation
floating.description: No adhesive required, perfect for DIY installation with quick and easy results

glued.title: Glued Installation
glued.description: Permanent fixing to subfloor for maximum stability in high-traffic areas

professional.title: Professional Installation
professional.description: Expert fitting available for complex layouts and optimal results

maintenance.title: Simple Maintenance & Care
maintenance.intro: One of the greatest advantages of Hybrid Wood flooring is its incredibly low maintenance requirements, making it perfect for busy households and commercial spaces.

dos.title: Recommended Care
dos.vacuum: Regular vacuuming or sweeping to remove dirt and debris
dos.dampMop: Damp mopping with mild household cleaners for deeper cleaning
dos.spills: Immediate cleanup of spills to prevent staining
dos.furniture: Use protective pads under furniture legs to prevent scratches

donts.title: Avoid These Practices
donts.excessWater: Excessive water exposure or standing water
donts.harsh: Harsh chemical cleaners or abrasive cleaning tools
donts.steam: Steam cleaning which can damage the wood surface
donts.wax: Wax or polish products that can create slippery surfaces

conclusion.title: The Future of Flooring is Here
conclusion.content: Hybrid Wood flooring represents the perfect balance of natural beauty, advanced technology, and environmental responsibility. Whether you're renovating your home or designing a new space, Hybrid Wood offers the durability, aesthetics, and sustainability that modern living demands.
conclusion.cta: Ready to experience the benefits of Hybrid Wood flooring in your home?
